    All Classes and Interfaces

    Classes
    Class
    Description
    AddMovieDialogController
    Controller class for the "Add Movie" dialog.
    AddProductDialog
    AddProductDialog is a dialog window used for adding new products.
    AddStaffDialog
    Represents a dialog interface for adding a new staff member to the system.
    AdminCancellationsController
    The AdminCancellationsController class manages the administrative functions related to order cancellation requests within the system.
    AdminController
    The AdminController class serves as the main controller for the admin dashboard in the application.
    AdminMoviesController
    Controller for managing movies in the admin interface.
    AdminScheduleController
    Controller for managing movie schedules in the admin interface.
    AdminSidebarController
    Controller for managing the admin sidebar.
    CashierActionBarController
    Controller class for the action bar in the cashier section of the application.
    CashierCartController
    Controller class responsible for managing the cashier cart, including adding/removing items, displaying cart details, calculating subtotal, discounts, tax, and final total.
    CashierController
    The CashierController class manages the multi-stage cashier workflow in the application, including user-related functionality, navigation between stages, and interaction with related controllers for components such as the action bar, cart, and customer details.
    CashierCustomerDetailsController
    The CashierCustomerDetailsController class manages the user interface and logic for handling customer details in a cashier context.
    CashierCustomerDetailsController.CustomerDetails
     
    CashierHeaderController
    Controller class responsible for handling the cashier header section in the cashier interface.
    CashierMovieDetailsController
    Controller class for the movie details modal in the cashier section.
    CashierMovieSearchController
    This class represents the controller responsible for handling movie search functionality in the cashier's interface of the application.
    CashierPaymentController
    Controller class responsible for managing the cashier payment process in a JavaFX application.
    CashierSeatSelectController
    Controller class for selecting movie seats in the cashier's system.
    CashierSessionSelectController
    The CashierSessionSelectController class manages the user interface for selecting movie sessions.
    CashierStepperController
    Controller class responsible for managing the stepper UI component in the cashier interface.
    DBConnection
    This class manages the connection to the database.
    EditProductDialog
    A dialog for editing the details of a product.
    EditStaffDialog
    The EditStaffDialog class provides a dialog interface to edit the details of a staff member.
    LoginController
    Controller class responsible for handling the login functionality of the application.
    MainApp
    MainApp is the entry point of the JavaFX application.
    ManagerController
    Controller for managing the primary manager interface.
    ManagerInventoryController
    ManagerInventoryController is responsible for managing and displaying inventory data for a store manager.
    ManagerPricingController
    The ManagerPricingController class manages the user interface and interactions for updating ticket prices and discounts.
    ManagerRevenueController
    The ManagerRevenueController class is responsible for managing and displaying revenue-related data for a manager.
    ManagerRevenueController.RevenueEntry
    Represents an entry in the revenue table, encapsulating the date, type, and amount of a specific revenue entry.
    ManagerRevenueController.RevenueStatistics
    The RevenueStatistics class is a data structure designed to hold revenue-related information for ticket and product sales, along with their respective VAT amounts and item counts.
    ManagerSidebarController
    Controller responsible for managing the sidebar functionality for a manager's interface.
    ManagerStaffController
    The ManagerStaffController class implements the management interface for handling staff-related operations within an application.
    Movie
    Represents a movie with properties such as title, genres, summary, poster image data, and duration.
    MovieDAO
    This class provides CRUD operations (Create, Read, Update, Delete) for managing movies in the database.
    MovieSession
    Represents a movie session for a specific movie in a cinema hall.
    Order
    Represents an order in a transactional system.
    OrderDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) for interacting with the 'orders' and 'order_items' tables in the database.
    OrderDAO.CancellationStats
    Represents statistics related to order cancellations.
    OrderItem
    The OrderItem class represents an individual item within an order.
    OrderItemTable
    Represents a table model for an order item in a point-of-sale or inventory system.
    PriceDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) for managing price-related operations, including ticket prices, age discounts, and logging price changes.
    PriceHistory
    The PriceHistory class represents a record of a price change for an item.
    Product
    Represents a product with details such as ID, name, type, price, stock, and image data.
    ProductDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) for managing product-related operations including retrieving, adding, updating, deleting products, and managing stock levels.
    SceneSwitcher
     
    Schedule
    This class represents the scheduling details for a movie session.
    ScheduleDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) for interacting with the "schedules" table in the database.
    ShoppingCart
    The ShoppingCart class manages a collection of OrderItem objects and provides methods for adding, removing, and retrieving items.
    User
    Represents a user in the system with properties such as username, password, role, and personal details like first name and last name.
    UserDAO
    Data Access Object (DAO) for interacting with the "users" table in the database.
